categories.name: Delivery Preferences
categories.description: How and when training will be delivered

questions.questionText: What is the contact person's full name?
questions.helpText: We need the full name to personalize the proposal
questions.aiExtractionHint: Look for person's name in email signature, opening greeting, or 'From' field

questions.questionText: What is the contact person's designation/role?
questions.helpText: Knowing their role helps us tailor the communication
questions.aiExtractionHint: Look for job title in signature or mentioned in context

questions.questionText: What is the contact email address?
questions.helpText: We'll send the proposal to this email
questions.aiExtractionHint: Extract from sender email or explicitly mentioned email address

questions.questionText: What is the contact phone number?
questions.helpText: For quick clarifications and follow-ups
questions.aiExtractionHint: Look for phone numbers in signature or body (Indian format +91 or 10 digits)

questions.questionText: What is the company/organization name?
questions.helpText: Helps us understand your organization's context
questions.aiExtractionHint: Extract from email domain, signature, or explicitly mentioned company name

questions.questionText: Which industry does your organization operate in?
questions.helpText: Helps us provide industry-specific examples
questions.aiExtractionHint: Infer from company name or context clues

questions.questionText: What is your company's approximate employee size?
questions.helpText: Helps us understand scale and organizational complexity

questions.questionText: What training topic or domain are you interested in?
questions.helpText: This determines the curriculum and trainers
questions.aiExtractionHint: Look for keywords like 'Agile', 'Leadership', 'Data Science', 'DevOps' etc.

questions.questionText: Could you describe the main challenge or problem you're trying to solve?
questions.helpText: Understanding your challenge helps us customize the solution
questions.aiExtractionHint: Look for phrases like 'struggling with', 'challenge', 'problem', 'need help with'
questions.placeholder: e.g., Our team struggles with sprint planning and delivery estimation

questions.questionText: How many people need to be trained?
questions.helpText: This affects pricing and logistics planning
questions.aiExtractionHint: Look for numbers followed by 'people', 'participants', 'employees', 'team members'

questions.questionText: What is the current skill level of participants?
questions.helpText: Helps us pitch the training at the right level

questions.questionText: What are the specific learning objectives or outcomes you expect?
questions.helpText: Helps us design curriculum to meet your exact needs
questions.aiExtractionHint: Look for phrases with 'should be able to', 'learn how to', 'understand', 'objectives'
questions.placeholder: e.g., Team should be able to plan and execute 2-week sprints effectively

questions.questionText: Preferred training delivery format?
questions.helpText: This affects logistics and pricing

questions.questionText: What is your preferred training duration?
questions.helpText: Helps us structure the curriculum appropriately

questions.questionText: What is your preferred training schedule?
questions.helpText: Helps us plan trainer availability

questions.questionText: When would you like the training to start?
questions.helpText: Helps us check trainer availability and plan logistics
questions.aiExtractionHint: Look for dates, months, quarters (Q1/Q2), or phrases like 'as soon as possible'

questions.questionText: Is there a specific deadline or event driving this training?
questions.helpText: Helps us understand urgency and prioritize accordingly
questions.placeholder: e.g., We're starting a new project in Q2 that requires these skills

questions.questionText: What is your approximate budget range for this training?
questions.helpText: Helps us propose the right solution within your budget

questions.questionText: Who will be the decision maker for this training?
questions.helpText: We'll address the proposal to the decision maker
questions.aiExtractionHint: Look for mentions of 'manager', 'director', 'head of', 'VP', 'reporting to'

questions.questionText: What is the approval process for training budgets in your organization?
questions.helpText: Helps us understand decision timeline and stakeholders
questions.placeholder: e.g., Manager approval + L&D head sign-off

questions.questionText: Do you require post-training certification for participants?
questions.helpText: Affects curriculum design and pricing

questions.questionText: Would you like post-training support or follow-up sessions?
questions.helpText: Ongoing support helps with knowledge retention

questions.questionText: For virtual training: What is the participants' time zone?
questions.helpText: Critical for scheduling virtual sessions

questions.questionText: For virtual training: Do you have a preferred platform?
questions.helpText: We can use your preferred platform or provide ours

questions.questionText: For virtual training: Who will provide the platform license?
questions.helpText: Affects overall cost and logistics
options: Please include platform cost in proposal

questions.questionText: For in-person training: What is the venue address?
questions.helpText: For trainer logistics and material shipping
questions.placeholder: Full address with city and pincode

questions.questionText: For in-person training: Do you have a training room with required facilities?
questions.helpText: We need projector, whiteboard, power outlets, WiFi

questions.questionText: For technical training: Do participants need lab/sandbox environment?
questions.helpText: Hands-on practice environment for technical topics
options: Yes, please provide cloud lab access
We have our own lab environment

questions.questionText: For technical training: What is participants' technical background?
questions.helpText: Helps trainers prepare appropriately
questions.placeholder: e.g., Java developers with 2-3 years experience, no Python knowledge

questions.questionText: How did you hear about us?
questions.helpText: Helps us understand our marketing effectiveness

conditionalRules.name: Virtual Training Platform Questions
conditionalRules.description: Show platform-related questions when delivery mode is Virtual or Hybrid

conditionalRules.name: In-Person Training Venue Questions
conditionalRules.description: Show venue questions for in-person training

conditionalRules.name: Technical Training Requirements
conditionalRules.description: Show technical questions for technical domains

conditionalRules.name: Large Group Virtual Warning
conditionalRules.description: Warn about large virtual training groups

actions.message: For large virtual audiences (50+), we recommend breakout room sessions and multiple trainers. This will be reflected in the proposal.

actions.suggestion: Consider splitting into multiple smaller batches for better engagement

conditionalRules.name: Budget Guidance - High Participant Count
conditionalRules.description: Provide budget guidance for large groups

actions.message: For groups over 100 participants, we typically offer volume discounts. This will be reflected in the pricing.

trainingDomains.name: Agile & Scrum
trainingDomains.description: Agile methodologies, Scrum framework, sprint planning, and iterative development
painPoints: Team struggles with sprint planning and estimation
Difficulty in adapting to changing requirements
Poor communication between development and stakeholders
Challenges with backlog grooming and prioritization

trainingDomains.name: Leadership & Management
trainingDomains.description: Leadership development, team management, coaching, and strategic thinking
painPoints: New managers lack coaching and delegation skills

trainingDomains.name: Data Science & Machine Learning
trainingDomains.description: Python, ML algorithms, data analysis, model deployment
painPoints: Lack of ML expertise in the team
Understanding when to use which algorithm
Translating business problems to ML solutions

trainingDomains.name: Cloud Computing (AWS)
trainingDomains.description: AWS services, cloud architecture, deployment, and management
painPoints: High AWS costs and optimization challenges
Lack of cloud expertise in team

trainingDomains.name: DevOps & CI/CD
trainingDomains.description: DevOps culture, CI/CD pipelines, automation, Docker, Kubernetes
painPoints: Lack of automation in testing and deployment
Poor collaboration between dev and ops

validationRules.name: Email Format Validation
validationRules.errorMessage: Please enter a valid email address

validationRules.name: Phone Number Validation
validationRules.errorMessage: Please enter a valid Indian phone number

validationRules.name: Participant Count Range
validationRules.errorMessage: Participant count must be between 1 and 10,000

validationRules.name: Future Date Validation
validationRules.errorMessage: Training start date must be in the future

validationRules.name: Budget Reasonability Check
validationRules.warningMessage: Budget seems low for the number of participants. Proposal will include options.

aiExtractionConfig.systemPrompt: You are an expert at extracting structured information from training enquiries. Extract all relevant details with high accuracy and provide confidence scores.

extractionPrompts.contact_name: Extract the contact person's full name from email signature or body
extractionPrompts.contact_email: Extract email address of the person making the enquiry
extractionPrompts.company_name: Identify company/organization name from email domain or explicit mention
extractionPrompts.training_domain: Identify the training topic. Match to: Agile, Leadership, Data Science, Cloud, DevOps, etc.
extractionPrompts.pain_point: Extract the main problem or challenge they're trying to solve
extractionPrompts.num_participants: Find how many people need training (look for numbers + people/participants/employees)
extractionPrompts.delivery_mode: Determine if they want online/virtual, in-person/onsite, or hybrid training
extractionPrompts.preferred_start_date: Extract any mentioned dates, months, quarters, or urgency indicators
extractionPrompts.budget_range: Look for budget mentions, pricing expectations, or cost constraints
extractionPrompts.decision_maker: Identify who makes the final decision (often mentioned as reporting to, manager, director)

aiExtractionConfig.fallbackStrategy: If confidence < 0.7, flag field for manual review

notificationTemplates.subject: üéâ Proposal Ready for {enquiry_number}
notificationTemplates.body: Great job! You've gathered enough information to generate a professional proposal for {company_name}. Click here to review and send.

notificationTemplates.subject: ‚è∞ Reminder: Complete discovery for {enquiry_number}
notificationTemplates.body: The enquiry from {company_name} is {days_old} days old and only {completeness_score}% complete. Take a few minutes to complete the discovery questions.

notificationTemplates.subject: üíé High-value enquiry: {enquiry_number}
notificationTemplates.body: New enquiry from {company_name} with {num_participants} participants and budget range {budget_range}. Assigned to {sales_rep_name}.
